amendment.description: Amendment sought to include a list of the number of trial and permanent modifications started under the HAMP program in each state as well as the number of seriously delinquent mortgages across the country that will not be eligible for HAMP modifications because Congress is terminating the program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 112-34 to include a list of the number of trial and permanent modifications started under the HAMP program in each state as well as the number of seriously delinquent mortgages across the country that will not be able to be eligible for HAMP modifications because Congress is terminating the program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 249 (Roll no. 196).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mrs. Maloney.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 249 (Roll no. 196).
